name: Lykke Advice
goal:
Lykke Advice is a European consultancy specialised in EU affairs.

Lykke Advice guide and help private and public entities doing business with the EU institutions - European Parliament, European Commission and Council.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Lykke Advice follows the EU agenda on agriculture, environment, fashion, creative industries and trade relations.
